channel.title: custom on Dave Svatora
channel.description: Recent content in custom on Dave Svatora

item.title: Computers and Stuff
item.description:
My Custom Built Mini ITX In early 2019 I decided to upgrade my mini itx machine to something that would play most current games as well as serve as an awesome developer machine. What started as a cpu only upgrade turned into a one of a kind computer you can’t get online or in any store. Click the image to find out more
Dualboot Pop!_OS/Windows This is a guide I use to set up a pc once I install a fresh Linux OS.

item.title: Mini ITX
item.description: It started off with just upgrading the i3 processor… …and turned into a bad a$$ custom built machine you can’t get anywhere. My first debate was to buy a 3 year old i7 for ~$300 or get a fairly new Ryzen 5 with 6 cores and 12 threads for half the cost. I’ve been an AMD fan for years but didn’t have good experiences with bulldozer or the Ryzen 5 2400G (Didn’t play well with Linux).
